import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; export const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", password2: "", }); const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name] : e.target.value}); return (

onChange(e)} required />
This site uses Gravatar so if you want a profile image, use a Gravatar email

Already have an account? Sign In

); };
